amendment.description: Amendment gives priority in awarding Federal grants to schools, states, and non-profits to encourage dislocated workers to complete their degrees.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 111-256 to give priority in awarding Federal grants to schools, states, and non-profits to encourage dislocated workers to complete their degrees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schauer amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 425 - 5 (Roll no. 715).
